bug.author: TobyRoseman
bug.summary: API Docs not update to latest version
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêûDescribe the bug</denchmark-h>
The latest version of coremltools is 3.1. However the hosted API docs are for 3.0. <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Go to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/coremltools#user-guide-and-examples>the main README</denchmark-link> . Click on "API documentation" link. Observe that the version number in the top left hand corner is not .

comments.comment: I've confirmed that the changes from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/coremltools/pull/541>#541</denchmark-link> have been deployed. It does seem like we are now serving the up to date API Docs. However the version number is still not updated. The top left of <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/coremltools/index.html>all API doc pages</denchmark-link> still show not . This is confusing to users as it's not clear what version they are looking at.
